Name: Synth Drift
About the game: The game consists of 30 levels where you need to race as fast as you can and reach the goal(s). It’s getting gradually harder the further you progress. This is not a complex game but you need to be fast and agile. Don’t idle for too long because spikes are closing in! Included are the following features: Achievement for each completed level. Online leaderboard with best completion times. Cloud saving and full controller support.
